description: Validates navigation to the Men category page and the correct display of products specific to this category.
steps: Verify navigation to the Men category page.
Ensure the product listing on the Men category page displays only items related to men.
Check the page title reflects the Men category.
expected_results: Navigation to Men category page is successful.
Only products related to men are displayed.
Page title matches the Men category.
edge_cases: Men category link is not clickable.
Products fail to load on the Men category page.
data_requirements: Accessible category link on the store page.
dependencies: Men category page implemented and functional.
api_interactions: Verify API fetches products specific to Men category.
Ensure API handles category navigation errors.
performance_metrics: Time taken to navigate to Men category page.
Page load time for Men category.
accessibility_requirements: Screen-reader compatibility for the Men category link.
